title: Cant use cooldown pings
body: i have my attack move binded to my left click because its more comfortable for me, but for some reason when i try to alt left click my abilities or anything im supposed to it doesnt do anything. im able to hit tab and click on the jungle timers and the cooldown pings work then but as for my abilities and everything else that its supposed to be used for....im out of luck. ive tried using other keys, searching google, looking in the config files, nothing helps me.

replies.body:
You may have unbinded the ''Alert Ping'' or ''Quick Alert Ping'' in the ''Communication'' Tab.
If you want to use Alt+Left Click you should put that there.
(>^.^)> ♥ <(^.^<)
you really are a gamer god thank you so much this is the answer!!!!!

THANKS!!! OMG MAN YOU SAVED ME !!!THANKS A LOT AND GL IN YOUR GAMES

It sounds like something may be acting weirdly with the configuration.  Please contact [player support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you out with this.
